name: The World of Zolcraft
description:
Our entry for Ludum Dare 38: A Small World.

From the stunning gamebook - Legend of Zol - Lightbringer, comes the new epic adventure MMORPG - The World of ZolCraft!

Level up and gain EXP!

Kill enemies and gather loot! Buy things from the Shop! Grind some more!

Make friends in World of Zolcraft! Role-play with girls even!

Controls

WSAD to move, J to attack / advance text
